articles.title: Delaying antibiotics for neutropenic fever may not affect survival of cancer patients - ThePrint
articles.description: Pennsylvania [US], December 30 (ANI): According to a study published in the American Journal of Medical Quality, postponing antibiotic treatment for longer than 60 minutes after the time of fever identification in cancer patients with neutropenic fever has no…

articles.author: Alicia Wallace
articles.title: Fed watch 2023: When will rate hikes slow down - CNN
articles.description: America's central bank found itself in a glaring spotlight for much of this past year, as Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell wielded blunt tools of interest rate hikes and quantitative tightening to curb surging inflation.
